COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix Memory Swappiness passing in Container Clone `DefineCreateFlags` was excluding clone from using the memory-swappiness flag leading the value to be zero when our deafult is -1. Rearrange the if/else to give clone these memory related options resolves #13856 Signed-off-by: cdoern <cdoern@redhat.com>
